contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox station | name = Holmesglen | type = | style = Melbourne | image = | image_caption = | address = | country = | coordinates = {{coord|37.87419|S|145.09141|E|format=dms|type:railwaystation_region:AU-VIC|display=inline,title}} | line = <!-- line information is detailed under "services" --> | other = | structure = | platform = 2 | depth = | levels = | tracks = 2 | parking = | bicycle = | baggage_check = | opened = | closed = | rebuilt = | electrified = | ADA = | code = HOL | owned = [[VicTrack]] | operator = | zone = | smartcardname = [[Myki]] zone | smartcardstatus = 1+2 overlap | status = [[Host station]] | former = | passengers = | pass_year = | pass_percent = | pass_system = | mpassengers = | services = {{s-rail|title=Metro Trains}} {{s-line|system=Victoria|line=Glen Waverley|previous=East Malvern|next=Jordanville }} | map_locator = [http://maps.google.com.au/maps?q=Malvern+East,+Victoria&hl=en&ll=-37.874565,145.089902&spn=0.004599,0.009645&sll=-37.859176,145.057994&sspn=0.0046,0.009645&vpsrc=6&hnear=Malvern+East+Victoria&t=m&z=17 Link] | Melway = [http://www.street-directory.com.au/sd3/map.php?x=145.09039079818263&y=-37.87452805595677&l=13&mt=4 Link] | web = [http://www.metlinkmelbourne.com.au/stop/view/19839 Link, includes timetables] }} '''Holmesglen''' is a [[railway station]] in [[Melbourne]], [[Victoria (Australia)|Victoria]], [[Australia]], located in the suburb of [[Malvern East, Victoria|Malvern East]], on the [[Glen Waverley railway line]]. Holmesglen is classed as a [[Host Station]] and is in [[Metcard]] Zone <span style="color:goldenrod;">1</span>+<span style="color:blue;">2</span> overlap. ==Station overview== ===Facilities=== Holmesglen is located at the western end of the Warrigal Road rail overpass, which provides station access. The station consists of two platforms, in an [[Island platform|island format]], with a large weatherboard building at the [[Glen Waverley railway station|Glen Waverley]] end of the station. A large [[Metcard]] ticket vending machine is located at the entrance to the platforms, which is able to dispense most ticketing options available and also accept notes and coins. A coin-only Metcard ticket vending machine and ticket office sits beside. An underpass is situated at the Glen Waverley end of the station. [[Myki]] readers and recharge machines are also installed at the station, in anticipation of the future replacement of the Metcard ticketing system. Due to curved track and platform, the centre of the platform is usually about 20 cm from the train. [[Holmesglen Institute of TAFE]] is located south of the station. ===History=== Holmesglen station opened on 5 May 1930, along with the railway line between [[East Malvern railway station|East Malvern]] and Glen Waverley.<ref>[http://www.vicsig.net/index.php?page=infrastructure&name=Holmesglen VICSIG Infrastructure - Holmesglen]</ref> The station was the site of a train crash in 2000.<ref>[http://www.doi.vic.gov.au/doi/doielect.nsf/2a6bd98dee287482ca256915001cff0c/e6d4b68aae1a681f4a256a6b00254f10/$FILE/Holmesglen%20Report.pdf Victorian Department of Infrastructure Accident Report]</ref> The rail bridge near the station was the crime-scene of an infamous Melbourne murder in the 1960s. ===Platforms=== '''Platform 1:''' *Suburban [[Metro Trains Melbourne|Metro Trains]] services to [[Flinders Street Station|Flinders Street]]. '''Platform 2:''' *Suburban Metro Trains services to Glen Waverley. ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Railway stations in Melbourne]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1930]] {{Melbourne-rail-stub}}
